headline: Robinhood Seeks Trump Accounts Role SpaceX Access And 24/7 Tokenization
summary: Robinhood Markets is reportedly being considered by the U.S. government to administer new government backed "Trump Accounts" for children. The company is also seeking a significant retail investor allocation in a potential SpaceX IPO. Robinhood is increasing its focus on crypto infrastructure through its backing of Talos and support for tokenized securities and 24/7 trading. Robinhood Markets (NasdaqGS:HOOD), trading at $99.48, sits at the center of several high profile policy and market...
